item.title: A Backlog for a Change
item.description: Nice post from Mike Cohn: How Do You Get from Here to Agile? Iterate. | Mike Cohn’s Blog - Succeeding With Agile®. Historically, when an organization needed to change, it undertook a “change program.

item.title: 0 (zero) Inbox
item.description: image: images/blog/blog-post-04.jpg feature_image: images/blog/blog-details-image.jpg Courtesy of ooOJasonOoo, Some Rights Reserved Is having an empty email Inbox a dream for you? In my opinion it’s not a dream or a goal, it’s a means, a resource.
